The armor becomes heavier, causing exhaustion to occasionally slow you down
enchantment.cursery.curse_blindness.desc: You have a chance to be blinded upon getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_weakness.desc: You have a chance to be weakened upon getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_explosive.desc: You have a chance to trigger an explosion on usage
enchantment.cursery.curse_hurtful.desc: You take extra damage on getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_hungryhealth.d: Getting hit consumes hunger for health
enchantment.cursery.curse_stubby.desc: Chance to only fire a weak arrow
enchantment.cursery.curse_recoil.desc: Chance get knocked back on firing
enchantment.cursery.curse_loose.desc: Chance to throw the item on usage
enchantment.cursery.curse_anvil.desc: Chance to get hit by anvils
enchantment.cursery.curse_hungry.desc: Chance to get Hunger on hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_undead.desc: Chance to get lit on fire under the sun
enchantment.cursery.curse_poison.desc: Chance to get poisoned when hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_switchy.desc: Chance to get switch hands on hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_electrified.de: Chance to sap you on usage
enchanted_book.desc: You feel a slight presence of dark curse magic
enchanted_book_cursed.desc: There is strong curse magic present
enchanted_table.desc: Curse magic seems to have tainted the table
enchant_curse_applied_1.desc: You feel a cold chill on your soul
enchant_curse_applied_2.desc: An unearthly presence sends a shiver down your spine
